mapper.select: SELECT ID, ACCOUNT_ID, NAME, COORDINATE[0] LATITUDE, COORDINATE[1] LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, INFO, PHONE_NUMBER, CAN_RESERVATION, OPERATING_TIME, IS_OPEN FROM STORE WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(ACCOUNT_ID, NAME, COORDINATE, ADDRESS, INFO, PHONE_NUMBER, CAN_RESERVATION, OPERATING_TIME, IS_OPEN) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{name}, POINT(#{latitude}, #{longitude}) , #{address}, #{info}, #{phoneNumber}, #{canReservation}, #{operatingTime}, #{isOpen})
